title.rendered: How Marketing Automation Helps Lead Nurturing

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1570736555564{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Personalize Your Marketing With Lead Nurturing

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1507151522386{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Lead nurturing gives you the power to target your leads with exactly the right message at exactly the right time – for your agency and your clients.

Check out the short video below to get an idea of how lead nurturing works, and then complete the form to get your copy of the full research briefing. Briefing includes:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

  • New obstacles to lead nurturing success
  • Most important marketing objectives
  • Success rates of lead nurturing strategies
  • Role of marketing technology
  • Biggest obstacles to success
  • Most effective lead nurturing tactics & more

[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ANSxARkCJ_Q&feature=youtu.be”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]

Get Your Free Whitepaper:

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy


[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
